scripts.rename-by-extension: cd test && node ../index.mjs action=rename filter=extension name=toto newName=square extension=exe
scripts.move-by-name: cd test && node ../index.mjs action=move filter=name name=tata pathToMove=~/Desktop/nameFolder
scripts.delete-by-extension: cd test && node ../index.mjs action=delete filter=extension extension=.webp
scripts.delete-by-name: cd test && node ../index.mjs action=delete filter=name name=occ
